{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E1700 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B00NC05KLO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/06/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-395L |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E1700 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6KB-25 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=MediaTek |sw_model=MT7530 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;2.6.36; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Single-Band Router with Gigabit Ports}}
[http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-E1700/ Product page]
The FCC test report indicates this device is using an MT7620x WiSoC.. presumably MT7620A. :CoO noted as Taiwan on the label
'''WRT-395L Rev:UD1''' is on the PCB. :Winbond RAM chip is ????G6KB-25
{{WiFiCert|WFA50663|10/31/2013}} :The WFA certification notes the device is using Linux kernel 2.6.36.
